resources.string:
Rateworld shows exchange rates of over 150 countries with easy and reliable interface.

The intuitive UI of Rateworld shows you all the information you need in one single screen.

FEATURES

1. Live currency exchange rates for more than 150 world currencies. 

2. Currrency calculator to compare and calculate the curriencies.

3. Show list of NEARBY money exchange centers within the range of 5 kms based on user current location.

4. On-Map navigation between the user's current location and money exchange center.

5. Auto updation with 1 minute of time interval. 

6. Daily NOTIFICATION of latest rates of selected currencies at 10 AM in the morning and 10 PM in the evening. 

7. Offline mode to allow currency conversion without internet connection.

8. Display amount up to 5 decimal places. 

9. Add and compare too many currencies at the single time.
Activate daily notification message of today\'s and previous day rates of selected currencies at 10 AM in the morning and 10 PM in the evening
1. Tap on particular currency to set it as default.
2. Remove particular currency by sliding tab from right to left.
3. User can add more currencies by clicking on \'plus\' button.
On clicking, shows a popup with the list of currencies.
4. By clicking on \'NEARBY EXCHANGE\' shows a popup with the list of all nearby exchange centers within a range of 5 Kms.
Clicking on shows on-map navigation between users\'s current location and money exchange center.
